name: <color_yellow>Mythical Martial Arts - Mods Extension</color>
description:
Adds MMA martial arts support for weapons from various mods <color_light_red>NOTE, you MUST have the mods below enabled, otherwise it will throw a NEGLIGIBLE (ignorable) error</color>

<color_light_green>Currently supported mods: Magiclysm, BL9, Cata++</color>
